channel.title: Meeting Minutes on UCOSP
channel.description: Recent content in Meeting Minutes on UCOSP

item.title: Markus March 19th Punchlines
item.description: Victoria Status Brainstormed ideas for the Dashboard. Went through draft Dashboard contents with Karen and Farah and got some good and constructive feedback Next Steps With the feedback I got back regarding the potential Dashboard contents, come up with a preliminary prototype — one that we can take apart and help establish a better idea as to how we’d like to design the Dashboard. Roadblocks Swamped with work (from my full-time position).

item.title: MarkUs Meeting Minutes for March 5th, 2010
item.description: The MarkUs team is plowing forward, fleshing out some fantastic new features, and kicking a bunch of bugs to the curb! You can read our meeting minutes here.

item.title: Eclipse4Edu Meeting Minutes
item.description: The meeting was held at 2:00 EST today and all members were present. Brenda – Working on hiding packages from the user – Buttons are easily hidden – Has been able to identify which elements of the package explorer are in fact packages, but is stuck on reworking the hierarchy so that the view skips over the package level Cory – Working on hiding menus and toolbars – Tried making his own RCP app because it seems this might be the best approach to get rid of unneeded menus and toolbars
